name: thermoforming of plastic sheets | thermoforming of plastic sheets | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13675/documentation

This service  activity represents thermoforming of plastic sheets of 200 microns to 2 mm thickness in plastic packaging for the food industry. The amount of plastic processed is NOT included. The activity refers to an INPUT of 1 kg of plastic sheets, i.e. all inputs and outputs are expressed per kg of raw materials input, i.e. T, where ;t (final product)= 0.946 kg / kg of raw material input;Y ( losses being recycled within the process (=internal recycling), closed loop)= 0.261  kg / kg of raw material;t' (losses recycled in external, opened loop)= 0.053  kg / kg of raw material ;T (raw materials, exluding internal recycling)= 1  kg / kg of raw material.;That is, an input of 1 kg of plastic sheet yields 0.946 kg of thermoformed plastic containers. Losses caused during production which are recycled internally are not accounted for explicitly. However, the additional energy requirements associated with the internally recycled plastic are considered. ;In detail, the activity includes: ;-	water and energy consumption;-	required auxiliaries such like detergents and solvents;-	production infrastructure ;-	direct emissions to air (VOC);-	wastewater treatment of the used auxiliaries;-	end of life of the production wastes incinerated and recycled externally;.;Prepared and submitted by Quantis, financed, supported and followed by Eco-Emballages (Sophie Bonnier, sophie.bonnier@ecoemballages.fr) and Elipso (Vincent Colard, v.colard@elipso.org)

The activity starts with the arrival of the raw materials, i.e. plastic sheets.

The activity ends with the production of thermoformed plastic containers. This process contains the auxiliaries and energy demand for the mentioned conversion process of plastics. The processed amount of plastics is NOT included into the dataset. The packaging of raw materials and final product is not considered.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: information from different French converting companies
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Survey. Around 60 000 tons of thermoformed products are sold in France per year (excluding FFS process that is not considered here). The survey represents the production volume weighted average of four companies in France covering roughly 60% of the overall market volume of this technology.

exchanges.description:
Service activity producing plastic sheets of 200 microns to 2 mm thickness used as packaging for the food industry. 
This activity should be used as follows: If an activity requires 1 kg of plastic sheets (produced by an inline plastic sheets and thermoforming process) the user should list (i) 1/0.946 = 1.0571 kg of the service and 1.0571 kg of the plastic type processed.
